references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), a foundational technique for novel view synthesis that many event-based 3D reconstruction methods build upon.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), the core rendering technique used in the proposed Event-3DGS method, offering advantages over traditional NeRF approaches.
This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of event cameras and their applications, which is crucial background for understanding the context and potential of event-based 3D reconstruction.

references.paper_title: Emvs: Event-based multi-view stereo-3d reconstruction with an event camera in real-time
references.reason: This paper presents a key early work on event-based 3D reconstruction that directly inspired the development of Event-3DGS and its methods.

references.paper_title: Ev-NeRF: Event based neural radiance field
references.reason: This paper is among the first to apply NeRF to event-based data, providing a direct comparison point for the proposed Event-3DGS method
